title: Affinity Devon Outlet Shopping
address: Clovelly Rd, Bideford EX39 3QU, United Kingdom
review:
Worth a visit if you are here to get your groceries or fuel.

 Nice clean shopping centre with clothes outdoor clothes, camping stuff, kitchen ware and more. I only bought a camping gas stove here because it cheaper than on mainland Europe. I walked through because I wanted some lunch from the bakery, Cornish Pasties and Scones. And I did my shopping at the ASDA supermarket nextdoor. Also filled my car in the nextdoor petrol station.
